name: Knightmare (itch)
description:
Take on all enemies of the Knight and protect the egg base!

CONTROLS
Move around with the ARROW keys or 'A' 'D' Jump with SPACEBAR
Dash with SHIFT keys (dash can be used as a weapon as well!)

Weapons that are placed around your base can be controlled only if you stand next to them.
Aim with the mouse and tear those invaders to pieces!!!
